==========================
 virtualenvwrapper.tmpenv
==========================

``virtualenvwrapper.tmpenv`` is a plugin for virtualenvwrapper_ for
working with temporary virtual environments. 

Features
========

After it is installed, the ``mktmpenv`` command can be used to create
a temporary virtualenv, which is deleted automatically when it is
deactivated.
